title: Gran Fondo Hincapie Pivots to Hurricane Helene Relief in Western North Carolina
content:
The 13th annual edition of the event has set a goal to raise one million dollars for the residents of Polk County, NC at the October 19 event.

Read the full article at Gran Fondo Hincapie Pivots to Hurricane Helene Relief in Western North Carolina on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
